title: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
EB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode should result in only one redraw of the affected area, not the entire client area.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Start the application with StyledText in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times, instead of just the affected area.
